title: Are there any good books about the everyday life and culture of Japan —preferably something written from a Japanese perspective and translated to English? - Quora

response.answer_text: Wow! That’s a very interesting question that you brought up on here! However, you have to give me some time to come up with one answer, because I have never thought of reading books about my own country, Japan, in Japanese. lol I am sure there are books about Japanese life and culture written in Japanese and being translated to English. Let’s see if anyone else answer to this question for you. That would give me some time to look for one! lol
